Extracts model coefficients from objects returned by PLNLDA

coef.PLNLDAfit.Rd

The method for objects returned by PLNLDA only returns coefficients associated to the $$\Theta$$ part of the model (see the PLNLDA vignette for mathematical details).

# S3 method for PLNLDAfit
coef(object, ...)

Arguments

object

an R6 object with class PLNfit
...

additional parameters for S3 compatibility. Not used

Value

Either NULL or a matrix of coefficients extracted from the PLNLDAfit model.

Examples

data(trichoptera)
trichoptera <- prepare_data(trichoptera$Abundance, trichoptera$Covariate)
myPLNLDA <- PLNLDA(Abundance ~ Wind, grouping = Group, data = trichoptera)
#> 
#>  Performing discriminant Analysis...
#> Warning: glm.fit: algorithm did not converge
#> Warning: glm.fit: fitted rates numerically 0 occurred
#> 
#>  DONE!
coef(myPLNLDA)
#>            Wind
#> Che -0.09857138
#> Hyc  1.72444086
#> Hym  0.06523092
#> Hys -0.36779692
#> Psy  0.32128854
#> Aga  0.22376519
#> Glo  0.12596448
#> Ath  0.05406782
#> Cea  0.59903153
#> Ced  0.12552155
#> Set  0.37678123
#> All  0.09586500
#> Han  0.15817991
#> Hfo  0.34022033
#> Hsp  0.30012364
#> Hve  0.14541495
#> Sta  0.24652771
